Docs.summary: Performs the default action associated with this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Clients can retrieve the object's default action by inspecting an object's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.DefaultAction%2A> property. A client can use automation (if supported) instead of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton.ToolStripSplitButtonAccessibleObject.DoDefaultAction%2A> to perform an object's default action. However, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton.ToolStripSplitButtonAccessibleObject.DoDefaultAction%2A> provides an easy way to perform an object's most commonly used action.
